ARABIC: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Circulating among them there will be youths like hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And young attendants like pearls within their shells, will go round.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Youths as fair as hidden pearls will be set apart to wait upon them; they will be running to and fro to serve them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be served by youths who will be as beautiful as pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And their boy servants shall go around them, as if they were pearls, safely hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And there will go round boy-servants of theirs, to serve them as if they were preserved pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And round them shall go boys of theirs as if they were hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and there go round them youths, their own, as if they were hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And there go round, waiting on them menservants of their own, as they were hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will be waited upon by immortal youths, like pearls hidden in their shells.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And there will go round on them youths appointed to attend them as though they were pearls hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will be waited upon by their youths, as if they were guarded pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Round about them will serve, (devoted) to them, young male servants (handsome) as Pearls well-guarded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And there will go round boy-servants of theirs, to serve them as if they were preserved pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and youths, of their own, shall pass among them as if they were hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Serving them will be youths like hidden pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:24] And there will circulate from all around them, for service, youths, delicate [in demeanour], of their own, as if, in terms of their beauty and immaculateness, they were hidden pearls, preserved inside shells, because when it [a pearl] is inside it, it is better than one that is not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And there go round) to serve them, (waiting on them menservants of their own), in their limpidity they (as they were hidden pearls) hidden from heat and cold.
